thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: BAM

author: BAM
title: BAM
text: I ordered four books after reading many reviews. I wasn't sure how it would work out, but I took the risk. All four books arrived in a week or less. Two arrived in the condition I paid for, but two did not. I emailed customer service and received a response in only a couple hours! Free replacements were sent out. I received them quickly and in the condition I paid for. I didn't have to return the others and they were donated. I will continue to buy from ThriftBooks.
